dmca.title: The Curio and Relic Weapons Gallery Takedown Notice
dmca.body:
Sirs-
    I am the owner and author of the web site "The Curio and Relic Weapons Gallery". I am capable of tracing all web traffic that uses my pictures of weapons. Persons participating on your web site are copying the photo images that I created from my own gun collection to animate and skin and  make their own. There are many, many references via "threads" to the pictures on my web site. I specifically state on all major pages of my site- "No reproduction without permission". This is being ignored. Links to my web site I don't mind, however downloading and/or using my creations for personal gain, whether it be monetary, gaming purposes, or entertainment will not be allowed. I am hereby notifying you that any unauthorized use of the images is denied. I am requesting that you post a permanent message in your "Animations and Skins" section  asking participants to heed my message, and respect my work and advise those so inclined to contact me before using my images. I will continue to monitor activity from "Day of Defeat".

    This first message's purpose is to let you know I am not happy that my images are being ripped off, and to document same. I will pursue and  exercise any option necessary to correct the situation.

Webmaster,
The Curio and Relic Weapons Gallery
dmca.principal_name: The Curio and Relic Weapons Gallery
